p: The location of the samples projection and the content of sesquiterpenes of the biogenetic germacrane similarity (germacrane and guaiane types of sesquiterpenes) on the opposite sides of the biplot showed the absence of germacrene type sesquiterpenes in samples from the Irkutsk region, while the guaiane type of sesquiterpenes were not found in samples from the Republic of Buryatia, Transâ€“Baikal region, Krasnoyarsk region, and Mongolia.
